description:
Dating is a slow and sometimes difficult process – spending an entire night with someone you don’t even know if you like or not, the difficult goodbye at the end of the night, the explanation as to why they aren’t the person for you and the apology, the guilt, the uncertainty of whether or not you made the right decision… we take all the pressure away and instead make dating fun and relaxed in a non threatening environment.

With speed dating, you get to enjoy 5 minutes with each person who attends (of the opposite sex) and we do the rest of the work for you. The opening reception will be from 8pm - 8.30pm, and will allow you to meet the other daters at the event, to give you a heads up on who you can look forward to meeting later on.

Between 8.30pm – 9.30pm, you will have the opportunity to spend 5 minutes with each date. Suggested question sheets will be provided in case your conversations dips and dating score sheets will also be provided for you to fill in, this helps you remember your thoughts on each date e.g. ‘interesting person, would like to know more’, or ‘so much in common, would like to see them again’.

After the dating section of the night is over, you will have more time to speak to everyone, or someone in particular… You will hand in a card with the names of the people you would like to meet up with again, and if they felt the same way as you, and put your name down, then it is a match! I will be in touch with both of you after the event to swap an approved e-mail address.

It’s as easy as that!

If you are interested in coming along to one of the speed dating events, please contact me. I need to make sure that I have the same number of girls and boys, and a maximum of 20 people at any one event. More than that is too overwhelming for this kind of night.

It is 20EUR, which you can pay using Paypal and this will allow you entry, and a free drink will be provided - to help break the ice.


Why speed dating:
• Fun night out
• May meet your match
• Something different
• Lots of people at one time for busy people
• No commitment
• You enjoy the evening and we do all the work to put you together
• No pressure – if you don’t like someone
• No strings attached event
• Non threatening environment
• Remain anonymous if you want
• Cuts down the trial and error process
• No embarrassment, if you like someone and they don’t like you – they will never know you picked them.
name: Let me help you meet someone special! And enjoy the process of doing so.

name: Let me help you meet someone special!

description:
Meeting new people can be a daunting task, and when life has thrown some challenges, it can be hard to know where to start to get back into a social rhythm. WEdate are therefore putting together an event for people in their late 30s - 40s to meet each other, so whether you want to meet a new friend, or perhaps your potential match, this could be the event for you.

For this event, we have moved away from the traditional speed dating pattern of 10 people in one night, 5 minutes with each person, in favour of allowing you to spend as much time as you want with the other participants in the room, hence the term: Slow Dating. We will provide you with a comfortable and safe environment in a beautiful space in Central Brussels and the opportunity to meet up to 7 potential friends / matches. We will provide a delicious afternoon tea style buffet and there will be a bar available to you whether you would like a cup of tea with your macaroon, or something stronger.

The event will last for 2 hours and we strongly recommend that you try to meet as many people, if not everyone in the room before you leave. As in traditional speed dating, you will let us know at the end of the event if you have met anyone that you would like to see again. If they felt the same way about you, and put your name down, then that is a match and we will be in touch after the event to connect you.

We need to ensure equal numbers of men and women at this event, and to do this we ask for a pre-payment of €25, this must be paid in advance to secure your place and covers the event and the afternoon tea style canapes.


We have already had significant interest in this type of event,  therefore please book your space early to avoid disappointment.

Please visit the 'next event' page on our website to make the payment or contact us directly on [masked].

We look forward to meeting you there.

Please see our website for our refunds policy.

venue.name: The lobby bar in a beautiful hotel in

name: Slow Dating: Make new friends / meet your match while enjoying afternoon tea

description:
After 3 very successful dating events, WEdate are pleased to announce our next one. On Saturday 13th December at 7.30pm, we will be having our last Speed Dating event of 2014! The age group is late 20s-30s and if you don’t know much about speed dating, keep reading!

Dating is a slow and sometimes difficult process – spending an entire night with someone you don’t even know if you like or not, the difficult goodbye at the end of the night, the explanation as to why they aren’t the person for you and the apology, the guilt, the uncertainty of whether or not you made the right decision… we take all the pressure away and instead make dating fun and relaxed in a non threatening environment.

After the dating section of the night is over, you will have more time to speak to everyone, or someone in particular… You will hand in a card with the names of the people you would like to meet up with again, and if they felt the same way as you, and put your name down, then it is a match! WEdate will be in touch with both of you after the event to swap an approved e-mail address.
It’s as easy as that!
If you are interested in coming along to the next speed dating event, please contact us. We need to make sure that we have the same number of girls and boys, and a maximum of 20 people at any one event. More than that is too overwhelming for this kind of night.
It is 20EUR, which you can pay using Paypal and this will allow you entry, and a free drink will be provided - to help break the ice.
